back for resources for all of these skills and instructions in blue have a video linked to explain the skill blue sheep knitwear 2025 3 #everywearsweater b a c k using the long-tail method cast on 31 p1 repeat r1 and r2 for a total of 25 27 30 34 38 41 44 48 53 57 note r1 and r2 count as the first two row of the total row you will knit this applies anytime the pattern says repeat rx and ry for a
